The color is exactly as it’s shown, fabric is soft and stretchy so it’s very comfortable. I wore this while playing on violin for two hours and it never gave me any issues (but I got a TON of compliments). The dress has a cute vintage look but I recommend a petticoat if you are want it to sit with more volume- otherwise the fabric is heavier and sits flatter on the body in the skirt area. Wrinkles very easy and must be dry cleaned. Size is exact - I’m 5’3”, 125 lbs and the small fit like a glove.

I was skeptical after reading the reviews, but this dress exceeded my expectations!! I ordered the Black/Snowflake pattern to wear to my work Christmas party and I am beyond excited to jazz it up with some sparkly snowflake jewelry and low heels and am even considering a tulle petticoat underneath to fluff it up a bit. I'm 5'4" 115lbs and got the XS. It fits like it was made for me and hits just below the knee.

Got a ton of compliments on the dress. Colors were bright and Halloween festive. Was comfortable to wear. Perfect length and seemed true to size.

This is a wonderful modest dress. The fabric is rather stretchy but holds it's shape. The dress does wrinkle but when ironed with no steam it smooths out nicely. If you would like it very snug I would buy a size smaller but if you get your normal size it still fits nice. I would highly recommend.

评论概述: Comfy, easy to dress up or down
评论详情: Photos are straight out of the bag, it needs a steaming. I ordered what was suggested,  an extra large. It feels a touch too big, but large may not have been as comfortable. I am wearing a petticoat in 1 photo and not the other for comparison.  I especially love it with the petticoat! It feels like a more casual look you could wear just about anywhere without the under garment. The fabric has a nice amount of stretch, and more fitted would still be comfortable. Zipper is nice quality for the price and feels like it will last a while. The color looked a bit darker, this piece is a little brighter, which is ok, however, I was hoping for a deeper hue. The material is thick enough to feel well made, but not restrictive.
This dress fits wonderfully. It has the right amount of stretch. It is a vibrant color. The material feels good on the skin. I’m thinking of order in other colors. Love it.

It is a wonderful dress

This dress is very pretty. I wore my navy dress with navy heels, pearl necklace, and a Sun hat to a 9/11 remembrance. Later I was told I looked very “East coast.” Exactly what I was going for - understated somber elegance. And bc it’s rayon, I wasn’t roasting (September can be downright hot where I live). Do size down- I had to send back my first dress and get a smaller size. Also it came very wrinkled. I ironed, but I think it wrinkled again in the car. Not sure what to do about that. Otherwise it’s a perfect dress and fits my pear/hourglass shape perfectly.

I could update my star rating,  if I could receive the missing belt! Over all lovely dress, has stretch to it, I'm usually an xs/ small 5'1 about 115 as you see it is quite long, does have room on the top as I have a small chest, but with a petticoat underwear would be perfect 👌

It was a little tight on me, but still okay. I am 5'5" tall and about 135 lbs. The arm holes showed more of my back skin than I wanted. But it worked okay. The fabric was thinner than I was expecting... not bad... just a little different. It wrinkles kinda easy and needs to be dry cleaned. But it worked great for me. I only needed it to work for about 5 nights for a show. The bow is not connected to the dress. I wasn't expecting that. It is just a long fabric piece that you tie around your waist. So, you can put the bow wherever you want... front, back, side. I think if I were a bit taller, it would have sat on me better. I was after something a little more fuller in the skirt part, and a little more substantial overall, but again it turned out to be fine for my needs.
From what I could tell when I tried it on, the dress was cute, but I couldn't begin to make any decision as it was so wrinkly. Therefore I am returning it! I don't need something I need to iron!

Bought this in a couple different colors during a sale. I’m 5’10”, 165#, 34DDD for reference. I bought size large in the navy polka dot and maroon colors. The polka dot color is amazing and does a great job at hiding the wrinkles. The maroon color is a wrinkle disaster because of the solid color. I work in an office and wear a dress nearly every day, always ironing and putting effort into my appearance. By the time I got to work on the day I wore the maroon dress I looked like I slept in it. The wrinkles were INSANE. I love the fit and style of these dresses however. I’ve purchased others in this same basic style but will stick to prints just to hide the wrinkles.

评论概述: Cheap broadcloth fabric- Not worth the price!
评论详情: I'm very disappointed with this dress. It fits just fine other than the scoop neck being too wide and creating a wonky gap, but the fabric is just cheap thin, stiff broadcloth. This is a dress you'd buy for $5-$10 at a thrift or discount shop. I agree with the person that said it looked like a 10 year old made it; man I wish I would have read the reviews first. This is why I hardly ever shop through Amazon. This dress is not worth 35 dollars let alone 10 dollars. Also it just came in a zip lock bag. It wasn't even really packaged. The dress could have easily been taken out of the bag and stolen. Amazon's refund & return policy is absolute garbage. I hope they at least change the items description to better reflect the actual dress. Wish I could at least get a partial refund because it's honestly a rip off. Thought I'd give Amazon a chance, but this has 100% turned me off purchasing clothing from this site again.

We're both wearing this dress. I'm 5'10", 250 lbs. and wearing a petticoat. She's 5'4?", not 250 lbs lol, and not wearing a petticoat. We wore these dresses to a 1950s themed who-done-it. The material is comfortable and has a little stretch to it, and it's wasy to clean.
